title: Titan armor
summaries: Titan armor is a Hardmode ranged armor set consisting of the Titan Helmet, the Titan Mail and the Titan Leggings. Each separate piece of Titan armor has a 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) chance of being dropped by Ocram, or can otherwise be crafted.
A full set of Titan armor provides the following benefits:

• +45 defense
  • +30% ranged damage
  • +20% ranged critical strike chance
  • +10% movement speed
  • +48% ammo conservation

statistics.Sell: 45 (set)
